title: Remove links and tags — remove_tag
code: Sys.setenv(CLIPR_ALLOW=TRUE) clipr::write_clip("A [[nice]] day. #happy", allow_non_interactive = TRUE) remove_tag() clipr::read_clip() #> [1] "A nice day."
